name: Punch It Deluxe (FREE-FULL VERSION)
description:
Relax, De-stress, and unwind your day in this simple and violent arcade game. Release your rage while the relief washes over you as you PUNCH, PULL, and TWIST your enemies (who, let's face it, probably deserved it).

This is the full-version of the game, but there is also available on STEAM for $3 if you want to support the development of more games like this.

Made in RPGMaker MV

Music by Evan Timmins
My weird website: Weirdrikert.com
My weird art: Twitter Newgrounds
